page.title: 18INDUSTRY AND COMMERCE (2)
page.content: {INDUSTRIES ON FREEMAN'S COMMON ESTATE} Asbestos products, Office Equipment, Motor Spares, Combustion Components, Windows, General Joinery, Textiles, Household and Industrial Locks, Confectionery, Aluminium Products, Forklift Trucks, Footwear, Toys, Yarn. Also to be found are meat proces- -sors and fruit & vegetable suppliers due to the close proximity of the markets. {INDUSTRIES ON KNIGHTON FIELDS ESTATE} Plastic products and Polythene bags, Knitwear, Textiles and Hosiery, Printers, Engravers and Sign Makers, Sheet Metal Works and Motor Engineers, Textile Machinery and Tool Makers, General and Precision Engineers, Air Conditioning and Paint Spraying. Also to be found are building suppliers, shop-fitters, a haulage firm and a Pharmacutical Warehouse.
